content:
I am more than happy to let you know CIIRC anti covid, 3D printed halfmask has been certified at the FFP3 level.

Find more information about the mask, certification, and data for download at: https://www.rp95.cz/en/

Anna Tahovská (CLAIRE Office, CZ) said:

I am more than happy to let you know CIIRC anti covid, 3D printed halfmask has been certified at the FFP3 level.

Find more information about the mask, certification, and data for download at: https://www.rp95.cz/en/

Vít Dočkal from CIIRC and the Prague office of CLAIRE talks about the 3D printed halfmasks on EURONEWS
http://www.ciirc.cvut.cz/ciirc-rp95-v-euronews/

CIIR CTU Testbed and RICAIP Team is delighted to invite you to the prestigious webinar organized by the AI4EU Café on April 16th, at 3:00 pm.

This time, our colleagues have been invited as speakers:
Dr. Vít Dočkal, Head of Project Management Office (PMO) and Dr. Pavel Burget, Head of Testbed for Industry 4.0.
They will speak, introduce and discuss about the development of the CIIRC RP95-3D Protective Half-Mask:
„The Fast Track From Scientific Idea to The Real Production as The CIIRC’s Contribution in The Fight Against The Coronavirus Pandemic.“

Please use this link to register:
https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7847921879435957004

More information can be found at:
https://www.ciirc.cvut.cz/cs/ai4eu-cafe-the-ciirc-rp95-3d-protective-half-mask/

AI4EU (www.ai4eu.eu) is the first European Artificial Intelligence On-Demand Platform and Ecosystem.

In case you missed the opportunity to watch the AI4EU Café webinar on April 16th, at 3:00 pm with Dr. Vít Dočkal and Dr. Pavel Burget on the topic of CIIRC RP95-3D Protective Half-Mask live, you can watch it via this link: https://www.gotostage.com/channel/6702ec1206e94bcf9dbf0a90cec427a7/recording/e46774f074b945b884e4df558a2b6d63/watch?source=CHANNEL

Of course mention of CLAIRE and successful ICT-48 projects included :slight_smile:
